abstract: Martín Gastón Demichelis (Spanish pronunciation: [marˈtin demiˈt͡ʃelis]; born 20 December 1980) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays for Manchester City in England, mainly as a central defender, although he can operate occasionally as a defensive midfielder.Demichelis spent most of his professional career with Bayern Munich in Germany (seven and a half years), winning 11 major titles with the team. He also competed in his home country with River Plate, and in Spain with Málaga.Demichelis gained 37 caps for Argentina, representing the country at the 2010 World Cup.
